skills.name: Stupid
skills.description: Each turn take a Ld test. If failed, roll a D6. 1-3: Move forward at half speed, 4-6: Do nothing.

skills.name: Nurgle's Rot
skills.description: See rulebook

skills.name: Horned One
skills.description: The Beastman can make an additional Attack with its basic Strength on a turn it charges.

skills.name: Shield Master
skills.description: When this hero is armed with a shield he may parry with it in addition to getting a 6+ save.

skills.name: Foul Odor
skills.description: All living enemies (not Undead or Possessed) are at -1 to hit him in hand-to-hand combat. In addition, the warrior cannot carry any open flames (torch, lantern, etc.) and fire attacks made against him are resolved at +1 Strength as his beer soaked clothing burns readily.

skills.name: Sign of Sigmar
skills.description: Possessed or Undead opponents lose their first attack against the Priestess in the first round of hand-to-hand combat (down to a minimum of 1).

skills.name: Chotec's Wrath
skills.description: D8 - A lightning bolt shoots from the sky above and strikes the closest enemy model within 10" of the Skink Priest, causing a single Strength 5 hit. However add +1 to the Strength and +1 to the roll on the injury table if the model is wearing armour like light armour, heavy armour, Ithilmar armour or Gromril armour

skills.name: Blood Oath
skills.description: Only a Warband's leader may have this skill, which allows him to re-roll a single Rout test once per game.

skills.name: Call of Vanhel
skills.description: D6 - A single Zombie or Dire Wolf within 6" of the Necromancer may immediately move again up to its maximum Movement distance (ie, 9" in the case of Dire Wolves). If this moves them into base contact with an enemy model, they count as charging.

skills.name: Haggle
skills.description: The warrior knows all the tricks of bargaining and haggling. He may deduct 2D6 gold crowns from the price of any single item (to a minimum cost of 1gc) once per post battle sequence

skills.name: Wolf's Hunger
skills.description: D7 - One member of the warband (priest's choice) is thrown into a Frenzy (See page 39 of the Mordheim rulebook for details.)

skills.name: Well 'ard
skills.description: The Orc may add +1 to any armour saves.

skills.name: Black Fury
skills.description: D8 - The Sorcerer may immediately charge any enemy model within 12" (ignoring any terrain and interposing models) and gains 2 extra Attacks and +1 Strength during this turn's hand-to-hand combat phase only

skills.name: Magical Aptitude
skills.description: This skill may only be taken by a warrior capable of casting spells. It may not be used by Sisters of Sigmar or Warrior Priests. The warrior has a keep aptitude for magic and can push himself beyond normal limits to produce a storm of spells. The warrior may attempt to cast two spells each turn as long as he is not in hand-to-hand combat. After attempting the first spell, he must take a toughness test. If he passes he may attempt a second spell that turn or even cast the same spell twice. If he fails he must roll on the injury table immediately with no saves treating out of action results as stunned instead

skills.name: The Hammer of Sigmar
skills.description: D7 - The wielder gains +2 Strength in hand-to-hand combat and all hits he inflicts cause double damage (eg, 2 wounds instead of 1). The Priest must test each shooting phase he wants to use the Hammer.

skills.name: Mutant
skills.description: The Beastman may buy one mutation. See Mutants section on special rules.

skills.name: Da cunnin' plan
skills.description: Only the Boss may have this skill. The warband may re-roll any failed Rout tests as long as the Boss is not out of action.

skills.name: Word of Pain
skills.description: D7 - All models within 3" of the Chaos Mage, friend or foe, suffer one S3 hit. No armour saves are allowed

skills.name: Fearless
skills.description: Immune to fear and terror and All Alone test.

skills.name: Powerful Build
skills.description: A warrior with this skill may choose skills from the Strength table. A spellcaster may never take this skill and no more than two warriors in the warband may take this skill at any one time.

skills.name: Art of Silent Death
skills.description: In hand-to-hand combat, the Skaven can fight with his bare paws without any penalties and counts as having two weapons (ie, +1 attack). In addition, a Skaven Hero with this skill will cause a critical hit on a To Wound roll of 5-6 instead of just 6. This skill may be used in conjunction with the Eshin Fighting Claws (+2 Attacks instead of +1).

skills.name: Gnawdoom
skills.description: D7 - The Gnawdoom causes 2D6 Strength 1 hits on a single model within 8" of the caster.

skills.name: Blessed Ale
skills.description: D5 - Like his brother Ulric, Taal has a great appetite for the strong ales of the Northern Empire. During the summer equinox each village in Ostland opens one keg of ale (at least!) in Taal's honor. Drinking a flask of Taal-blessed ale (the priest is assumed to carry as many flasks as are needed) may heal any one model within 2" of the Priest (including himself). The warrior is restored to his full quota of Wounds. In addition, any living enemy models (not Undead or Possessed) within 2" of the Priest will be lose 1 Attack during the next round of combat due to the potent fumes of the ale.

skills.name: Resource Hunter
skills.description: When rolling on the Exploration chart at the end of a game, the Hero may modify one dice roll by +1/-1.

skills.name: Great Hunter
skills.description: Imposes an additional -1 to hit the Skink if he is in cover, IE a -2 to hit penalty.

skills.name: Tactician
skills.description: This skill may only be taken by a warband leader. The warrior has a great tactical mind and can often find the best positions for his warriors to meet the oncoming attack. In any scenario the warband leader may reposition his warriors after his opponent has set up and may even advance them up to 12 inch onto the board instead of 8 inch.

skills.name: Step Aside
skills.description: The warrior has a natural ability to avoid injury in combat. Each time he suffers a wound in close combat he may make an additional saving throw of 5+. This save is never modified and is taken after all other armour saves.

skills.name: Ignore Pain
skills.description: Only a Clan Pestilens member with the Resilient strength skill may choose the Ignore Pain special skill. A Clan Pestilens member with this skill treat "Stunned" injuries as "Knocked Down"

skills.name: Smashed leg
skills.description: May not run, but may charge as normal

skills.name: Zzap!
skills.description: D9 - Range 12". Causes D3 S4 hits on the closest enemy target, with no armour saves allowed.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: A warrior with this skill is nimble and as fast as quicksilver. He can avoid any hits from a missile weapon on a D6 roll of 5+. Note that this roll is taken against missiles as soon as a hit is scored to see whether the warrior dodges it or not, before rolling towound, and before any effects from other skills or equipment (such as lucky charms).

skills.name: Fooled Ya!
skills.description: D6 - No enemy may charge the Shaman during their next turn. If the Shaman is engaged in hand-to-hand combat he may immediately move 4" away.

skills.name: Censer Bearer
skills.description: Only a Clan Pestilens member with the Black Hunger special skill may choose the Censer Bearer special skill. He gains the special rule Frenzy and the only weapon he may use in close combat is a censer.

skills.name: Bellowing Roar
skills.description: Only the Beastmen Chief may have this skill. He may re-roll any failed Rout tests.

skills.name: Cutlass Master
skills.description: If the pirate is equipped with a Sword, this skill will give him the additional benefit of also being able to parry successfully if the player rolls equal to number rolled to hit. This extra ability only apply if the Pirate is not in the open ie., only when in cover or in a building, within 2"of a terrain feature like a wall or tree, etc.

skills.name: True Grit
skills.description: When rolling on the Injury table for this Hero, a roll of 1-3 is treated as knocked down, 4-5 as stunned, and 6 as out of action.

skills.name: Shadowbind
skills.description: D9 - The Shadow Weaver may cast this spell at any enemy model within 24" of him and 2" of a wall. The target may not move unless it first passes a Strength test on D6+1 at the start of his turn (before the Recovery Phase). This spell lasts until the Shadow Weaver suffers a Wound or attempts to cast another spell. If attacked while affected by this spell, treat the target exactly as if he were Stunned.

skills.name: Clubba
skills.description: D7 - The ectoplasmic club counts as a normal club with +2 Strength bonus and gives the Shaman +1 attack as well. This spell lasts until the Shaman suffers a wound.

skills.name: Tawosret's Scroll of Tomb Dust
skills.description: D7 - A single warrior within 12" is knocked down. Only affects living models.

skills.name: Fires of U'Zhul
skills.description: D7 - The fireball has a range of 18" and causes one Strength 4 hit. It strikes the first model in its path. Armour saves are taken as normal (ie, with -1 modifier).

skills.name: Web of Steel
skills.description: Few can match the ability of this warrior. He fights with great skill, weaving a web of steel around him. The model gains +1 to all his rolls on Critical Hit tables in hand-to-hand combat

skills.name: Battle Tongue
skills.description: This skill may only be chosen by a leader. The warrior has drilled his warband to follow short barked commands. This increases the range of his Leader ability by 6". Note that Undead leaders may not use this skill

skills.name: Daemonic Vigour
skills.description: D8 - Any Plague Bearers or Nurglings within 8" of the Master increase their Daemonic Aura save from 5+ to 4+ until the beginning of their next turn.

skills.name: Re-Animation
skills.description: D5 - One Zombie that went out of action during the last hand-to-hand combat or Shooting phase immediately returns to the battle. Place the model within 6" of the Necromancer. The model cannot be placed straight into hand-to-hand combat with an enemy model.

skills.name: Earth Shudder
skills.description: D9 - Taal's domain includes both the earth and the skies and his power can reach out even into the dark streets of Mordheim. When his name is invoked three times and the blood of an eagle is poured on the ground, the Lord of the Wild will cause thunder to rumble and the earth to shake. The spell is cast on a single building within 4". Any enemy models touching the building will suffer a single S3 hit. In addition the building will collapse and any models on it will count as having fallen to the ground (for example a model falling 5" to the tabletop must pass two Initiative tests to avoid taking D3 S5 hits.) Remove the terrain feature from the board for the rest of the game.

skills.name: Bear's Paw
skills.description: D7 - Many an armored knight has been knocked to the ground by the surprising Strength of the followers of Taal. Although traditionally called 'Bear's Paw' this spell is sometimes referred to as 'Moose's Breath' by those Ostlander's who have felt its power. The Priest invokes the blessing of Taal on himself or a single friendly model within 6". The target receives a bonus of +2 to his Strength until the Priest's next turn.

skills.name: Eye of God
skills.description:
D7 - You may use the Eye of God successfully only once per battle. Choose any single model within 6", friend or foe. Roll a D6 to see what happens to the affected model.
D6 Result:
1 The wrath of the gods descends upon the target. The model is taken out of action immediately. He does not have to roll on the Serious Injury chart after the battle though.
2-5 The model gains +1 to any one of his characteristics during this battle (chosen by the player who cast the spell).
6 The model gains +1 to all of its characteristics for the duration of the battle.

skills.name: Bloodlust
skills.description: D7 - The Wolf Priest is infused with a lust for battle and attacks wildly. All attacks are at +2S, and he scores a critical hit on a 5-6. The Wolf Priest must test, by rolling the prayer's difficulty or greater on 2D6, each turn to see if the prayer remains in effect.

skills.name: Sprint
skills.description: The warrior may triple his Movement rate when he runs or charges, rather than doubling it as normal.

skills.name: Shield of Shadow
skills.description: D7 - The Shadow Weaver may cast this spell on himself or a member of his warband within 12". The target receives an armour save of 5+ that is not modified by the attacker's Strength. The spell lasts until the start of the Shadow Weaver's next turn.

skills.name: Cloak of Darkness
skills.description: D7 - The Shadow Weaver is effectively concealed from enemy sight. As long as he does not attack (cast spells, shoot, or engage in close combat) any enemy models, he may not be attacked. He may intercept as normal if the player controlling him wishes, but he does not have to do so (and if he does not, enemy warriors may charge past him of course). The spell lasts until the Shadow Weaver attacks an enemy model. Note that a model engaged in close combat with an enemy warrior may never choose to not attack

skills.name: 'ere we go!
skills.description: The model may ignore Fear and Terror tests when charging.

skills.name: Scabrous Hide
skills.description: D8 - The Master has an armour save of 2+ which replaces any normal Armour save. The Scabrous Hide lasts until the beginning of his next Shooting phase

skills.name: Warrior Wizard
skills.description: This skill may only be taken by spellcasters. The mental powers of the wizard allow him to wear armour and cast spells.

skills.name: Menkare's Scroll of Urgency
skills.description: D6 - A Skeleton Soldier within 6" may move 4". The model may charge.

skills.name: Bellowing Battle Roar
skills.description: The Saurus' roar is so deafening that enemy models in base contact suffer -1 to hit in the first round of combat against them.

skills.name: Sniper
skills.description: If Hidden, a warrior with this skill may shoot or cast spells and still remain Hidden. If the target is not taken out of action, they get to make an Initative test to spot the sniper. If succesful, the model is no longer hidden.

skills.name: Luck of Shemtek
skills.description: D6 - The wizard may re-roll all his failed dice rolls, though the second results stand. The effect lasts until the beginning of his own next turn

skills.name: Fey Quickness
skills.description: An Elf with Fey Quickness can avoid melee or missile attacks on a roll of 6. If the Elf also has Step Aside or Dodge this will increase to a 4+ in the relevant area.

skills.name: Waaagh!
skills.description: The warrior may add +D3" to his charge range.

skills.name: Soul Stealer
skills.description: D9 - Once successfully cast, the Sorceress has to make a to hit roll against a model in base contact. If the attack is successful and her opponent is struck, he suffers a wound with no armour save possible. The Sorceress feeds on this life-force and adds one wound to her profile. Note: the Sorceress can never have more then one extra wound from the use of this spell and the extra wound is lost at the end of the battle.

skills.name: Fearsome
skills.description: Such is the reputation and physique of the model that he causes fear in opposing models

skills.name: Singing Wind
skills.description: D8 - The goddess appears in the form of singing motes and dancing lights that will entrance and 'hold' any model within 10" until the start of the Amazon player's next turn. The model cannot move, shoot, or cast spells, but may defend itself in hand-to-hand combat. Models affected by this ritual automatically go last in combat

skills.name: Sotec's Blessing
skills.description:
D7 - This spell may be cast on a single model within 6" of the Skink Priest or on himself. Roll a D6 to determine the blessing. The effects remain in play until the Priest or the model is Stunned or taken Out of Action. Only a single model may be affected by the blessing at any given time. D6 Result:
1-2 - +1 BS or +1 to hit in close combat.
3-4 - Toughness +1.
5-6 - Movement and Initiative +1.

skills.name: Lightning Reflexes
skills.description: If the warrior is charged he will 'strike first' against those that charged that turn. As the charger(s) will also normally 'strike first' (for charging), the order of attack between the charger(s) and the warrior with this skill will be determined by comparing Initiative values.

skills.name: Ferocious Charge
skills.description: May double attacks when charging. Gains -1 to hit if attacks are doubled.

skills.name: Snow Squall
skills.description: D6 - Ulric extends his protection to the Wolf Priest in the form of a localized snow squall that engulfs the model. All enemy models in hand-to-hand combat with the priest are at -1 to hit due to the swirling snow and winds. The spell lasts for the duration of the hand-to-hand combat.

skills.name: Utter Determination
skills.description: Only the Matriarch may have this skill, which allows her to re-roll any failed Rout tests.

skills.name: Wings of Darkness
skills.description: D7 - The Chaos Mage may immediately move anywhere within 12", including into base contact with an enemy, in which case he counts as charging. If he engages a fleeing enemy, in the close combat phase he will score one automatic hit and then his opponent will flee again (if he survives).

skills.name: Absolute Faith
skills.description: She may re-roll any Fear tests and does not have to test if she is fighting alone against several opponents.

skills.name: 'eadbasher
skills.description: Any knocked down results which the Orc causes in hand-to-hand count as stunned results instead.

skills.name: Wendala's Maelstrom
skills.description: D7 - The storm extends out from the Priestess 18". All attempts to shoot missile weapons by the enemy will be at -1 to hit. The ritual lasts up until the start of the Amazon player's next turn

skills.name: Spell of Awakening
skills.description: D Auto - If an enemy Hero is killed (ie, your opponent rolls 11-16 on the Serious Injury chart after the battle) then the Necromancer may raise him to fight as a Zombie in his servitude. The dead Hero retains his characteristics and all his weapons and armour but may not use any other equipment or skills. He may no longer run, counts as a Henchman group on his own, and may not gain additional experience. This spell always succeeds (rules for Henchmen and experience are described later). The new Zombie follows all the normal Zombie rules (immune to poison, causes fear) except for retaining his profile, weapons and armour.

skills.name: Monster Slayer
skills.description: Always wounds on 4+ unless a lower roll is needed

skills.name: Healing Hand
skills.description: D5 - Any one model within 2" of the Priest (including himself) may be healed. The warrior is restored to his full quota of Wounds. In addition, if any friendly models within 2" are stunned or knocked down, they immediately come to their senses, stand up, and continue fighting as normal.

skills.name: Neferre's Scroll of Quaking Horror
skills.description: D7 - A model within 12" must pass a Leadership test or flee 2D6" directly away from the Liche Priest. The model will continue to flee in the Movement phase unless he passes a Leadership test in the Recovery phase. No effect on Undead or models immune to psychology.

skills.name: Master of Poisons
skills.description: If the Hero doesn't search for rare items, he may make D3-1 doses of Dark Venom instead. The poison must be used in the next battle and cannot be sold or traded to other warbands.

skills.name: Hunch
skills.description: This skill may only be taken by the warband leader. The warrior has an uncanny knack of placing his men in the right place at the right time, as if he senses danger through instinct alone. In any scenario the warband leader may position up to 3 of his men capable of earning experience in any ruined building on the board that is at least 12" away from an enemy model and not in the enemy deployment zone.

skills.name: Tinci's Rage
skills.description: D8 - A single Lizardman within 6" of the Skink Priest or himself, is overtaken by rage and follows the rules for Frenzy, in addition he gains +1 Strength. This spell remains in play until the Skink Priest or the model is Stunned or is taken Out of Action. At the beginning of the turn the Skink priest must pass a Leadership roll in order to keep the spell going. Only a single model may be affected by the blessing at any given time, but the Skink Priest can choose to release the spell at the beginning of his turn if he wish to attempt to recast it on another model later in the shooting phase

skills.name: Manhater
skills.description: Will be affected by the rules of hatred when fighting any Human warbands.

skills.name: Berserk Charge
skills.description: When this hero is armed with an axe or double handed weapon, he may re-roll all failed to hit rolls when he charges.

skills.name: Doombolt
skills.description: D9 - The bolt of doom may be targeted at any enemy model in line of sight. The Doombolt has an 18" range and causes a Strength 5 hit. If the target model is wounded, then the next closest model within 6" is also hit on a 4+, at -1 Strength than the previous hit. The bolt will keep leaping until there are no more targets within range or until its Strength drops to a one. Each model can only be hit by a bolt once per turn. Take armour saves as normal

skills.name: Oi! Gerroff!
skills.description: D7 - Range 8". Moves any enemy model within range D6" directly away from the Shaman. If the target collides with another model or a building, both suffer 1 S3 hit. Note: Very handy for dropping people from high buildings with. May not be cast on models in hand-to-hand combat

skills.name: Jump Up
skills.description: The warrior can regain his footing in an instant, springing to his feet immediately if he is knocked down. The warrior may ignore knocked down results when rolling for injuries, unless he is knocked down because of a successful save from wearing a helmet or because he has the No Pain special rule.

skills.name: Children of the Horned Rat
skills.description: D Auto - This spell must be used before the game, and may only be used once. When cast, the spel summons D3 Giant Rats, which are placed within 6" of the Sorcerer. The Sorcerer may cast this spell successfully only once per battle, and the rats disappear after the battle. They do not count towards the maximum size of the Skaven warband.

skills.name: Siren's Dreams
skills.description: D7 - The song is so beautiful and mesmerising that it momentarily distracts the Amazon's enemies within 12" such that all Ld tests for the opposing warband are made at -1 until the end of the opposing player's next turn. Lizardmen and Undead are immune to the effects of this ritual.

skills.name: Tangle Foot
skills.description: D8 - It is said that when Taal walked the earth, living things would spring up behind him as he passed. A portion of his power can be summoned by his followers to help re-grow forests and aid in the return of the land to its natural state. Plants, vines and even small trees burst forth from the earth, hindering all those who attempt to move through them. All models (friend as well as foe) with the exception of Ostlander Jaeger within 12" of the Priest can only move at 1/2 speed until the next shooting phase.

skills.name: Scribe
skills.description: The warrior is a natural adept at writing and making scrolls. Any warrior with the ability to cast spells or use prayers may take this skill. It allows them to make a scroll before the battle and inscribe a single spell or prayer upon it that they are versed in. The scroll may be used just before they are about to cast the spell or prayer and allows the caster +2 to his difficulty roll. Once used the scroll will crumble to dust and is useless. Scrolls may not be saved up from battle to battle if they are not used.

skills.name: Bulging Biceps
skills.description: The Pit Fighter may ignore the entire 'heavy' weapons special rule penalty. The Strength bonus will now apply to all rounds in Close-Combat.

skills.name: Frenzy
skills.description: Must charge if able. Gets double Attacks in close combat. Loses frenzy if Knocked Down or Stunned

skills.name: Old battle wound
skills.description: Before each game, roll a D6, on a roll of 1 the warrior misses the game

skills.name: Horrebe's Curse of the Mummy
skills.description: D8 - A model within 18" and in base contact with a Mummy gains -1 penalty on all to hit rolls, to wound rolls and armour saves. Lasts until the start of the next Tomb Guardian shooting phase.

skills.name: Vision of Torment
skills.description: D10 - This spell has a range of 6" and must be cast on the closest enemy model. If the Chaos Mage is in hand-to-hand combat, he must choose his target from those in base contact with him. The affected model is immediately stunned. If the model cannot be stunned it is knocked down instead.

skills.name: The Old Ones' Protection
skills.description: D6 - The Skink Priest and any Lizardmen within 4" of him gain a save of 4+ against the effects of spells or prayers. This spell remains in play until the Skink Priest is taken Out of Action

skills.name: Swashbuckler
skills.description: The pirate may make a Leadership Test at the end of any Hand-to-Hand phase (pirate's or enemy's turn) if he is still in base contact with any enemy models. If he passes he may make a normal movement away from the enemy (he may not run or charge), without the enemy striking any blows on him. If he fails the test he remains in combat and must fight as normal in the following turn

skills.name: Hide in Shadows
skills.description: An enemy warrior attempting to detect this warrior when he is Hidden must halve his Initiative before measuring the distance.

skills.name: Hearts of Steel
skills.description: D8 - Any allied warriors within 8" of the warrior become immune to Fear and All Alone tests. In addition, the whole warband gains +1 to any Rout tests they have to make. The effects of this spell last until the caster is knocked down, stunned or put out of action. If cast again the effects are not cumulative, ie, the maximum bonus to Rout tests remains +1

skills.name: Sea Shanty Singer
skills.description: At the start of his Close Combat phase he can suddenly burst out in song, distracting one opponent in base contact of his choosing. That enemy must pass a Leadership test, or loose 1 Attack that turn. This does not effect Undead or other non-living creatures, such as Possessed.

skills.name: Death vision
skills.description: D6 - The Necromancer causes fear in his enemies for the duration of the battle.

skills.name: Pistolier
skills.description: The warrior is an expert at using all kinds of pistols. If he is equipped with a brace of pistols of any type (including crossbow pistols), he may fire twice in the Shooting phase (though note that normal reloading rules apply). If he has a single pistol then he may fire it in the same turn it was reloaded.

skills.name: Serpent's Strength
skills.description: D9 - All friendly models close to the Priestess will be charged with a frantic energy until the end of their next turn. During this time any model within 8" of the Priestess (including herself) will add +1 to their Strength. The ritual cannot be cast if the Priestess is in close combat during her Shooting phase. The effects will continue after the ritual is cast if the Priestess enters combat.

skills.name: Mighty Blow
skills.description: The warrior knows how to use his strength to maximum effect and has a +1 Strength bonus in close combat (excluding pistols). As his Strength is used for close combat weapons, the bonus applies to all such weapons

skills.name: Lifestealer
skills.description: D10 - You may choose a single model within 6". The target suffers a wound (no save allowed) and the Necromancer gains an extra wound for the duration of the battle. This may take the Necromancer's Wounds above his original maximum value. This spell will not affect the Possessed or any Undead models.

skills.name: Ulric's Howl
skills.description: D10 - The Wolf Priest's prayer is answered as an ear-shattering inhuman howl roars from his throat. For the duration of the battle, all members of the priest's warband are immune to Fear and All Alone tests as they feel the presence of their god. Additionally, all Rout tests are at +1.

skills.name: Eagle Eyes
skills.description: The warrior's sight is exceptionally keen. He adds +6"to the range of any missile weapon he is using

skills.name: Wings of Night
skills.description: D6 - This spell may only be cast if the Shadow Weaver is within 2" of a wall. He is instantly moved up to 12" to a place that is also within 2" of a wall. If moved into contact with an enemy model, the Shadow Weaver counts as charging in the first round.

skills.name: Huanchi's Stealth
skills.description: D7 - The spell affects all Skinks within 6" of the Skink Priest, including himself, and allows any model that is in cover to immediately to go into hiding. A model may go into hiding even if they ran in the movement phase or has already shot with a missile weapon

skills.name: Knife-Fighter
skills.description: The warrior is an unrivalled expert at using throwing knives and throwing stars. He can throw a maximum of three of these missiles in his shooting phase and may divide his shots between any targets within range as he wishes. Note that this skill cannot be combined with the Quick Shot skill

skills.name: Shield of Thorns
skills.description: D7 - The ritual produces a cocoon of thorns all about the Priestess, making her immune to ranged or magical attacks. Any models wishing to charge the Priestess can do so but the thorns negate any strikes by the Priestess and her enemies in the first round of combat. The Priestess cannot cast this ritual while in hand-to-hand combat.

skills.name: Led'z go
skills.description: D9 - Any Orc or Goblin within 4" of the Shaman will automatically strike first in hand-to-hand combat regardless of other circumstances. The spell only lasts until the caster is knocked down, stunned or taken out of action.

skills.name: Virtue of Valour
skills.description: If fighting a model with a higher Strength characteristic than himself, the Knight may reroll any failed to hit rolls in hand-to-hand combat.

skills.name: Pit Fighter
skills.description: The warrior has learned how to fight in enclosed spaces from his time in the dangerous fighting pits of the Empire. He is an expert at fighting in confined areas and adds +1 to his WS and +1 to his Attacks if he is fighting inside buildings or ruins. It's a good idea to define which bits of your terrain collection count as 'buildings or ruins' at the start of a battle to avoid confusion later.

skills.name: Righteous Fury
skills.description: The model hates all Skaven, Undead or Possessed warbands and all models in them.

skills.name: The Living Jungle
skills.description: D6 - Pick one model within 12". The model is suddenly swarmed by a savage mix of snakes, spiders and insects, most of them poisonous. The afflicted model takes 1D6 Strength 2 hits with no armour saves allowed apart from Ward saves. You cannot use a dodge save against a swarm

skills.name: Streetwise
skills.description: A warrior with this skill has good contacts and knows where to purchase rare items. He may add +2 to the roll that determines his chances of finding such items (see the Trading section).

skills.name: Resilient
skills.description: The warrior is covered in battle scars. Deduct -1 Strength from all hits against him in close combat. This does not affect armour save modifiers

skills.name: Master of Runes
skills.description: When using Elven Runestones, the mage is +1 to his dispel roll. In addition, one member of the Warband may reroll a single failed armour save or Parry roll once per battle. After a single battle, the runes lose their glamour and must be redone. Shadow Weavers only

skills.name: Sea Legs
skills.description: If the pirate falls during a battle, he may ignore the effects of the D3 hits on a roll of 4+ (make a single roll to see if the any of the hits take effect or not). In addition, if he is knocked down or stunned within 1"of a precipice he may re-roll his Initiative test to see if he falls down or not.

skills.name: Infiltration
skills.description: The model is always placed on the battlefield after the opposing warband and can be placed anywhere on the table as long as it is out of sight of the opposing warband and more than 12" away from any enemy model. If both players have models which infiltrate, roll a D6 for each, and the lowest roll sets up first.

skills.name: Body Slam
skills.description: Instead of making his normal attacks the Pit fighter may make a single attack resolved as following: +1Str, +1 to Hit, no weapon bonuses or abilities. Critical hit on a 5+. Only when charging.

skills.name: Shaggy Hide
skills.description: The model gains a 6+ Armor Save that can be combined with other armor as normal

skills.name: Black Hunger
skills.description: The Skaven Hero may declare at the beginning of his turn that he is using this skill. The Hero may add +1 attack and +D3"to his move for the duration of his own turn but will suffer D3 S3 hits with no armour save possible at the end of the turn.

skills.name: Force of Will
skills.description: When the Pit Fighter loses his last wound and is taken Out-of-Action, he must roll a D6 equal or under his Toughness, each following round he has to roll again on his toughness but then with a -1 modifier for each subsequent round. If he succeeds he gets up and may continue to fight, when he gets taken Out-of-Action a second time he'll be removed as normal.

skills.name: Sword of Rezhebel
skills.description: D8 - The sword gives the wizard +1 Attack, +2 Strength and +2 Weapon Skill. Take a Leadership test at the beginning of each of the wizard's own turns. If the test fails, the sword disappears.

skills.name: Summon Squirrels
skills.description: D7 - Taal is the master of all beasts both great and small. Those who anger him may be mauled by a mountain lion or drowned in a flood caused by an angry beaver. With this spell the Priest invokes the wrath of the Lord of Beasts, summoning forth dozens upon dozens of enraged squirrels. The furious rodents assault one enemy within 12" of the Priest, crawling inside the warrior's clothing and armor, pelting him with nuts and causing numerous tiny bites and welts. The target suffers 2D6 Strength 1 hits. No armor saves allowed.

skills.name: Bull Rush
skills.description: When he charges, this Hero may attempt to knock down his opponent rather than making his normal attacks. Roll to hit once with a +1 to hit modifier, though no 'to wound' roll is necessary. Instead, if the warrior hits with this attack, the opposing model is Knocked Down

skills.name: Strike to Injure
skills.description: The warrior can land his blows with uncanny accuracy. add +1 to all injury rolls caused by the model in hand-to-hand combat.

skills.name: 'ard ead
skills.description: The Orc has a special 3+ save on a D6 to avoid being stunned. If the save is made, treat a stunned result as knocked down instead. If the Orc also wears a helmet, this save is 2+ instead of 3+

skills.name: Virtue of Impetuous
skills.description: The Knight may add +D3"to his move when charging. Roll the dice each time you wish to charge and before moving the model.

skills.name: See in Shadows
skills.description: As long as he has movement to reach them, the warrior may always roll to charge opponents he cannot see (instead of the normal 4").

skills.name: Hardy Constitution
skills.description: During the battle, the pirate may ignore any Critical Hits on a roll of 5+ (the wound is treated as normal if the roll is successful).

skills.name: Buboes
skills.description: D7 - This spell has a range of 8" and affects a single enemy warrior. The warrior must pass a Toughness test or lose a Wound. No Armour saves are allowed

skills.name: Leap
skills.description: The warrior may leap D6" in the movement phase in addition to his normal movement. He may move and leap, run and leap, or charge and leap, but he can only leap once per turn. A leaping warrior may jump over opposing man-sized models, including enemies, and obstacles 1"high, without penalty. The leap may also be used to leap over gaps, but in this case you must commit the warrior to making the leap before rolling the dice to see how far he jumps. If he fails to make it all the way across, he falls through the gap (see page 28).

skills.name: Pool of Shadow
skills.description: D7 - This spell allows the mage and all within 6" to Hide, exactly as if there were a wall or other obstruction between them and their enemies. They may Hide even after marching. This Hiding is disrupted if any enemy enters the area of affect. In addition, all affected count as being in cover against enemy shooting. This spell lasts until the start of the Shadow Weaver's next turn.

skills.name: Deathspasm
skills.description: D10 - The Deathspasm has a range of 6" and must be cast on the closest enemy model. The affected model must roll on the injury chart. If successfully cast, the casting Sorceress is immediately knocked down

skills.name: Stag's Leap
skills.description: D7 - Many of Taal's priests wear a stag skull as a symbol of their devotion and the Forest Lord's power can be used to emulate the speed and beauty of this magnificent beast. The Priest of Taal may immediately move anywhere within 9", including into base-contact with the enemy, in which case he counts as charging and gains a +1 Strength to his first round of attacks. If he engages a fleeing enemy, in the close combat phase he will score one automatic hit at +1 Strength and then his opponent will flee again (if he survives).

skills.name: Armour of Righteousness
skills.description: D9 - The Priest has an armour save of 2+ which replaces his normal armour save. In addition, he causes fear in his enemies and is therefore immune to fear himself. The power of the Armour of Righteousness lasts until the beginning of the Priest's next Shooting phase.

skills.name: Master of Blades
skills.description: When using a weapon that has a Parry special rule, this hero parries successfully if he beats or matches his opponents highest 'to hit' roll. In addition, if this warrior is using two weapons that have the Parry special rule, he is allowed to parry two attacks instead of the normal maximum of one. Note that if this Dwarf has two Dwarf axes he can reroll any failed parries.

skills.name: Lure of Chaos
skills.description: D9 - The spell has a range of 12" and must be cast on the closest enemy model. Roll a D6 and add the Chaos Mage's Leadership to the score. Then roll a D6 and add the target's Leadership to the score. If the Chaos Mage beats his opponent's score he gains control of the model until the model passes a Leadership test in his own recovery phase. The model may not commit suicide, but can attack models on his own side, and will not fight warriors from the Chaos Mage's warband. If he was engaged in hand-to-hand combat with any warriors of the Chaos Mage's warband, they will immediately move 1" apart.

skills.name: Soulfire
skills.description: D9 - All enemy models within 4" of the servant of Sigmar suffer a Strength 3 hit. No armour saves are allowed. The servants of darkness and Chaos are especially susceptible to Sigmar's holy power. Undead and Possessed models in range suffer a Strength 5 hit instead.

skills.name: Silver Arrows of Arha
skills.description: D7 - Unlike other spells, this cannot be cast whilst in hand-to-hand combat. The spell summons D6+2 arrows which the wizard can use to shoot against one enemy model. The arrows have a range of 24". Use the wizard's own Ballistic Skill to determine whether he hits or not, but ignore movement, range and cover penalties. The arrows cause one S3 hit each.

skills.name: Acrobat
skills.description: The warrior is incredibly supple and agile. He may fall or jump from a height of up to 12"without taking any damage if he passes a single Initiative test, and can re-roll failed Diving Charge rolls. He can still only make a diving charge from a height of up to 6"

skills.name: Cause fear
skills.description: The warrior causes fear

skills.name: Combat Master
skills.description: The warrior is able to take on several opponents at once. If he fights against more than one enemy at a time, he gains an extra Attack in each hand-to-hand combat phase as long as he is fighting two or more enemy models. In addition, the warrior is immune to 'All Alone' tests.

skills.name: Warpfire
skills.description: D8 - The spell has a range of 8", hitting the first model in its path. The spell causes D3 Strength 4 hits on its target, and one Strength 3 hit on each model within 2" of the target

skills.name: Toughened Hide
skills.description: The Saurus will only be taken out of action on a 6+.

skills.name: Witch Flight
skills.description: D7 - The Sorceress may immediately move anywhere within 12", and may count as charging. If she engages a fleeing enemy in the close combat phase she will score 1 automatic hit and then the opponent will flee again

skills.name: Tail Fighting
skills.description: The Skaven may wield a shield, knife or a sword with its tail. The model gains an extra attack with the appropriate weapon or a +1 bonus to its armour save.

skills.name: Animal Friendship
skills.description: Animals will never attack him and up to two Wardogs (see Mordheim book, page 54) that the warrior owns do not count against the maximum number of models in the Warband.

skills.name: Dark Blood
skills.description: D8 - This attack has a range of 8" and causes D3 S5 hits. It hits the first model in its path. After using this spell the Chaos Mage must roll on the Injury table for himself to see how dangerous the wound is, though treat the out of action result as stunned instead.

skills.name: Expert Swordsman
skills.description: This warrior has been expertly taught in the art of swordsmanship. He may re-roll all missed attacks if he is using a sword in the hand-to-hand phase of the turn that he charges. Note that this only applies when they are armed with normal swords or weeping blades, and not with doublehanded swords or any other weapons.

skills.name: Booming Voice
skills.description: (Captain only) Once per turn, the captain may shout encouraging words (or threats) at any one pirate within 8"who just failed his test to see if he runs away from combat, or to stop running away if he was already fleeing. That pirate may then re-roll the test. This can only be done if the Captain is on his feet, but not if the Captain is in close combat himself.

skills.name: Unstoppable Charge
skills.description: When he charges, the warrior is almost impossible to halt. He adds +1 to his Weapon Skill when charging.

skills.name: Fury of Khaine
skills.description: The Dark Elf may make a 4"follow up move if he takes all of his close combat opponents out of action. If he comes into contact with another enemy this starts a new combat. This new combat takes place in the following turn and the model counts as charging. May not follow up in the opponent's turn

skills.name: Call of Ulric
skills.description: D10 - The Wolf Priest lets out a cry of agony as his body re-shapes itself into that of a huge, slavering wolf. During the time that the priest is in the form of a wolf, he may do nothing but attack as a wolf: no spell-casting or weapons use. He still hates Sigmar's minions, however. In each shooting phase, the priest may choose to make a Ld test (using the Wolfs Ld6) to regain his human form. If he is still in wolf form at the end of the battle he gets one last chance to return to human form. If he does not, then he remains a wolf forever! He is still a hero, and thus entitled to XP gains and attribute increases. He may only choose skills from the Speed Table, with the exception of Scale Sheer Surfaces. Add a unit with type Wolf Form for stats.

skills.name: Grizzled Veteran
skills.description: The Pit Fighter is immune to all psychology.

skills.name: Contagious
skills.description: Only a Clan Pestilens member with the Rotten Body special skill may choose the Contagious special skill. A model who takes the contagious member out of action must take a Toughness test. Roll a D6. If failed, he will suffer an automatic wound. Models of undead and possessed never take this test.

skills.name: Strongman
skills.description: The warrior is capable of great feats of strength. He may use a double-handed weapon without the usual penalty of always striking last. Work out order of battle as you would with other weapons.

skills.name: Trick Shooter
skills.description: The warrior can shoot through the tiniest gap without it affecting his aim. He ignores all modifiers for cover when using missile weapons.

skills.name: Hunter
skills.description: The warrior is an expert at getting his weapon loaded and ready. He may fire each turn, even with weapons that can normally only be fired every other turn

skills.name: Barbarian Courage
skills.description: This hero never needs to take all alone tests and may re-roll failed fear tests.

skills.name: Weapons Training
skills.description: A warrior with this skill is adept at using many different weapons. He may use any hand-to-hand combat weapon he comes across, not just those in his equipment options.

skills.name: Fire of Gork
skills.description: D8 - Range 12". Each of the two bolts causes D3 S3 hits -  the bolts can either be fired both at the closest enemy target or split between the two closest enemy targets.

skills.name: Nimble
skills.description: The warrior may move and fire with weapons that are normally only used if the firer has not moved. Note that this skill cannot be combined with the Quick Shot skill

skills.name: Word of Pain (Dark Elves)
skills.description: D8 - The spell may be cast at an enemy model within 12". The victim must re-roll all successful hand to hand or missile attacks and all to wound rolls. If the victim wishes to charge, he must pass a successful Leadership test first. Lasts until the beginning of the next Dark Elf turn.

skills.name: Rotten Body
skills.description: The model is now immune to poisons and diseases and, if taken out of combat because of a failed test for wielding a censer, he will not have to roll for injuries at the end of the battle, recovering automatically.

skills.name: Blinded in one eye
skills.description: -1 BS. Must leave the warband if the other eye is blinded too.

skills.name: Virtue of Noble Disdain
skills.description: The Knight is subject to Hatred of all enemies armed with shooting weapons. See the Leadership and Psychology section (p38).

skills.name: Protection of Sigmar
skills.description: Any spell which would affect her is nullified on a D6 roll of 4+. Note that if the spell is nullified it will not affect any other models either.

skills.name: Shield of Faith
skills.description: D6 - The Priest is immune to all spells. Roll at the beginning of each turn in the recovery phase. On a roll of 1 or 2 the shield disappears.

skills.name: Wall Runner
skills.description: The Skaven does not need to take an Initiative test when climbing up walls and other sheer surfaces.

skills.name: Hammerschlag
skills.description: D10 - The Wolf Priest calls down a hammer blow from Ulric on any model within 6". That model suffers a S4 attack from an enormous ethereal hammer, including the concussion special rule.

skills.name: Eye of the Warp
skills.description: D8 - All standing models in base contact with the Sorcerer must take an immediate Leadership test. If they fail, they each suffer a Strength 3 hit and must run 2D6" directly away from the Sorcerer, exactly as if they had lost their nerve when fighting against more than one opponent.

skills.name: Sorcerer's Curse
skills.description: D6 - The spell has a range of 12" and affects a single model within range. The target must re-roll any successful armour saves and to hit rolls during the Skaven hand-to-hand phase and his own next shooting and hand-to-hand combat phases.

skills.name: Flamesword
skills.description: D8 - The Sorceress may choose the hand-to-hand combat weapon of a member of her warband within 6" to be engulfed in flames. A weapon with these flames acts as a normal weapon of its type, but also adds a +2 bonus to the users Strength. Hits inflicted from the weapon ignore armour saves. Lasts until the Sorceress' next shooting phase.

skills.name: Itzl's Speed
skills.description: D7 - A single Lizardman model within 6" of the Skink Priest or himself, may make an additional sprint of movement and move up to 4". This counts, as running and a model may not move if he has already fired with a missile weapon. He may not charge with this extra move.

skills.name: Berserker
skills.description: Gains +1 to hit when charging

skills.name: Flight of Zimmeran
skills.description: D7 - The wizard may immediately move anywhere within 12", including into base contact with an enemy, in which case he counts as charging. If he engages a fleeing enemy in the close combat phase he will score 1 automatic hit and then his opponent will flee again (if he survives).

skills.name: Thick Skull
skills.description: The dwarf has a 3+ save on a D6 to avoid being stunned. If the save is made, treat a stunned result as knocked down instead. If the Dwarf also wears a helmet, this save is 2+ instead of 3+.

skills.name: Quick Shot
skills.description: The warrior may shoot twice per turn with a bow or crossbow (but not a crossbow pistol).

skills.name: Virtue of Purity
skills.description: Any spell cast against the knight will be dispelled on the D6 roll of a 4+

skills.name: Djedre's Summonation of the Vengeful Dead
skills.description: D5 - A Skeleton Soldier that was put OOA the last turn may be re-animated. May be placed anywhere within 6" of the Liche Priest but not in hand to hand combat.

skills.name: Weapons Expert
skills.description: The warrior has been trained to use some of the more unusual weapons of the known world. He may use any missile weapon he comes across, not just the weapons available from his warband's list.

skills.name: Pestilence
skills.description: D10 - All enemy models within 12" of the Master suffer a Strength 3 hit. No Armour saves are allowed.

skills.name: Arms master
skills.description: The Pit Fighter may now ignore all 'difficult to use' rules for all weapons.

skills.name: Arcane Lore
skills.description: Witch Hunters, Sisters of Sigmar and Warrior-Priests may not have this skill. Any warrior with this skill may learn Lesser Magic if he owns a Tome of Magic.

skills.name: Wyrdstone Hunter
skills.description: The warrior has an uncanny ability to find hidden shards of wyrdstone. If a Hero with this skill is searching the ruins in the exploration phase you may re-roll one dice when rolling on the Exploration chart. The second result stands.

skills.name: Sorcery
skills.description: This skill may only be taken by Heroes capable of casting spells. A warrior with this skill gains +1 to his rolls to see whether he can cast spells successfully or not. Note that Sisters of Sigmar and Warrior-Priests may not use this skill

skills.name: Immune fear
skills.description: The warrior is immune to fear

skills.name: Dread of Aramar
skills.description: D7 - A single model within 12" of the wizard must pass a Leadership test or flee 2D6" directly away from him. If he flees, he must test at the start of each of his own movement phases and will continue to flee until he passes a test. Note that this spell does not affect Undead or any model immune to fear.

skills.name: Extra Tough
skills.description: When rolling on the Heroes Serious Injury chart for this Hero after a game in which he has been taken out of action, the dice may be re-rolled once

skills.name: Virtue of Discipline
skills.description: Once per game, if the knight is not out of action, stunned or knocked down, you may re-roll a failed rout test.

skills.name: Spell of Doom
skills.description: D9 - Choose one enemy model within 12". The model must immediately roll equal to or less than his Strength on a D6 or the dead emerging from the earth will rend him with supernatural power. If he fails, you may roll on the Injury table to see what happens to the unfortunate warrior

skills.name: Mind Focus
skills.description: The warrior possesses a great strength of mind which allows him to concentrate beyond the levels of most normal men. This skill may only be taken by a warrior capable of using prayers or casting spells. When using a spell or prayer the warrior with this skill may reroll one dice roll used in the difficulty roll.

skills.name: Merneptah's Scroll of the Scarab Song
skills.description: D7 - A single model within 8" suffers 2D6 S1 hits. The model may not be shot at nor fought in hand to hand combat for the rest of the turn. If the model is already in hand to hand combat, move it 1" away from the combat. Counts as having stood up next turn if no other injuries are rolled.

skills.name: Scale Sheer Surfaces
skills.description: A warrior with this skill can scale even the highest wall or fence with ease. He can climb up or down a height equal to twice his normal Movement, and does not need to make Initiative tests when doing so.

skills.name: Stench of Nurgle
skills.description: D8 - This spell has a range of 6" and affects all living creatures ' friend or foe. Each enemy warrior in range must pass a Toughness test or lose an Attack until their next turn

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: During the shooting phase the warrior may choose to taunt one enemy instead of shooting with a missile weapon or casting a spell. The warrior must be able to see the enemy and taunting follows all the LOS rules for shooting (you must taunt the nearest opponent, etc.). The enemy then takes a Leadership test. If he fails he must spend his next movement phase trying to get into close combat with the warrior who taunted him.

skills.name: Crushing Blow
skills.description: No enemy may parry an attack made by this hero

skills.name: Cloud of Flies
skills.description: The Tainted One's close combat opponents suffers a-1 to hit modifier on all attacks.

skills.name: Frenzy
skills.description: Must charge if able. Gets double Attacks in close combat. Loses frenzy if Knocked Down or Stunned

skills.name: Pit Fighter
skills.description: The warrior has learned how to fight in enclosed spaces from his time in the dangerous fighting pits of the Empire. He is an expert at fighting in confined areas and adds +1 to his WS and +1 to his Attacks if he is fighting inside buildings or ruins. It's a good idea to define which bits of your terrain collection count as 'buildings or ruins' at the start of a battle to avoid confusion later.

skills.name: Stream of Corruption
skills.description: Grants a ranged attack with range 6" and S3. No armour saves allowed

skill_lists.name: Mortuary Cult Scroll
skills: Djedre's Summonation of the Vengeful Dead
Merneptah's Scroll of the Scarab Song

equipment.name: Cat o' Nine Tails
equipment.description: +1 Armour Save. Cannot be parried. When the wielder charges they gain +1A for that turn. This bonus attack is added after any other modifications. When the wielder is charged they gain +1A that they may only use against the charger. This additional attack will 'strike first'. If the wielder is simultaneously charged by two or more opponents they will still only receive a total of +1A. If the wielder is using two whips at the same time then they get +1A for the additional hand weapon, but only the first whip gets the whipcrack +1A.

equipment.name: Crossbow
equipment.description: S4, Range 30"

equipment.name: Nurgle's Rot
equipment.description: See rulebook

equipment.name: Rapier
equipment.description: Strength as user. May parry. +1 Armour Save. If fails to wound, make an additional attack at -1 to hit until down to a maximum of needing 6 to hit. Marienburgers and Reiklanders only

equipment.name: Elf bow
equipment.description: S3, Range 36", -1 armour save

equipment.name: Bloated Foulness
equipment.description: Gives +1 Wound, +1 Toughness, and -1 Movement

equipment.name: Dwarf axe
equipment.description: Strength as user, -1 Armour save, may parry

equipment.name: Hardtack biscuits
equipment.description: +1T for 1 turn (opponents turn too). Roll a D6, on a roll of 1, miss next game.

equipment.name: Axe
equipment.description: Strength as user, gives -1 in Armour Save. Bladed

equipment.name: Throwing knives
equipment.description: Strength as user, Range 6"

equipment.name: Tarot Cards
equipment.description: May take a Leadership test before each battle. If successful, the hero may modify a die in exploration by +1/-1, even if the hero was taken out of action. If failed by 3 or more, the hero misses the game.

equipment.name: Heavy armour
equipment.description: Gives 5+ Armour Save, gives -1M if combined with a shield

equipment.name: Wyrdstone Pendulum
equipment.description: The model may re-roll one die in exploration if an Ld test is passed. May only be used if the the model was not taken out of action

equipment.name: Gromril sword
equipment.description: Strength as user, gives -1 in Armour Save, may parry. Bladed

equipment.name: Chaos Armour
equipment.description: Gives a 4+ Armour Save. May still cast spells.

equipment.name: Pavise
equipment.description: The model counts as in cover from missile weapons. Counts as a shield if charged from the front. The model moves at half pace

equipment.name: Holy tome
equipment.description: +1 to Difficulty roll for prayers

equipment.name: Steel whip
equipment.description: Cannot be parried. When the wielder charges they gain +1A for that turn. This bonus attack is added after any other modifications. When the wielder is charged they gain +1A that they may only use against the charger. This additional attack will 'strike first'. If the wielder is simultaneously charged by two or more opponents they will still only receive a total of +1A. If the wielder is using two whips at the same time then they get +1A for the additional hand weapon, but only the first whip gets the whipcrack +1A.

equipment.name: Blowpipe
equipment.description: S1, Range 8". Save modifier +1. Darts covered in black lotus, no critical hits. May be used while hidden, though if target passes an Initiative test, the model is no longer hidden.

equipment.name: Short bow
equipment.description: S3, Range 16"

equipment.name: Weeping blades
equipment.description: Strength as user. May only be used in pairs. Permanently coated in Black lotus. May parry with re-roll

equipment.name: Gromril armour
equipment.description: Gives 4+ Armour Save

equipment.name: Jolly Roger
equipment.description: Any Pirates within 12" of the Jolly Roger never count as being All Alone in combat. Carrying the banner takes up one hand though, so that model may not carry or use any two-handed weapons during the game. No effect on Swabbies.

equipment.name: Tome of magic
equipment.description: A wizard may learn an additional spell permanently. A model with Arcane Lore may learn a Lesser Magic spell or a spell normally available to wizards of the warband type

equipment.name: Hochland long rifle
equipment.description: S4, Range 48", fire every other turn, -2 armour save, move or fire, pick target

equipment.name: Censer
equipment.description: Two-handed. Strength as user, +2 Strength in first round of HtH. Bludgeoning. A model hit by the censer must pass a Toughness test or suffer an additional wound. The wielder of the censer must take the same test but only 6 fails. Undead and Possessed are immune to this effect.

equipment.name: Rabbit's foot
equipment.description: The model may re-roll a failed dice roll once per battle

equipment.name: Lucky charm
equipment.description: First hit on the model is discarded on a roll of 4+ on a D6

equipment.name: Double handed club
equipment.description: Strength as user +2, 2-4 is stunned. Bludgeoning

equipment.name: Cloven hoofs
equipment.description: Gives +1M

equipment.name: Dark elf bladed dagger
equipment.description: Strength as user, +1 to critical hit, 2-4 is stunned, +1 Armour save

equipment.name: Mordheim map
equipment.description:
Roll a D6:
1 - Your opponent may choose next scenario
2-3 - You may re-roll one die next exploration
4 - You may choose next scenario
5 - You may re-roll 3 dice next exploration
6 - You may re-roll one dice in each exploration unless the model with the map is taken OOA

equipment.name: Daemon Weapon
equipment.description: A hand-to-hand combat weapon with +1S and +1 to hit

equipment.name: Cathayan silk cloak
equipment.description: May re-roll first rout test. Destroyed on 1-3 if unit taken OOA. Only Mercenary leaders may use.

equipment.name: Handgun
equipment.description: S4, Range 24", fire every other turn, -2 armour save, move or fire

equipment.name: Telescope
equipment.description: +D6" to missile weapons each turn. Triples the range to spot hidden enemies

equipment.name: Fire Bomb
equipment.description: Range twice the thrower's Strength. Deals D3 S4 hits with no armour save. All models within 1" take 1 S3 hit. On a roll of 1 to hit, the bomb explodes on the

equipment.name: Stone axe
equipment.description: Strength as user, 2-4 is stunned. Bludgeoning

equipment.name: Parrot
equipment.description: All enemy in base contact with the owner will be at '1 to hit in their first round of combat with the pirate unless they can pass a Leadership Test.

equipment.name: Scorpion tail
equipment.description: Gives an additional attack at S5 or S2 if the model is immune to poison.

equipment.name: Scroll of the Rat Familiar
equipment.description: The Scroll of the Rat Familiar has a spell inscribed on it, usable by a Pestilens Sorcerer as many times as he wants. If the warband includes at least a Giant Rat, the spell may be cast on it before the combat begins, transforming it in a Rat Familiar. If his Rat Familiar is within 6" , the sorcerer may reroll once in a game the dice to overcome the difficulty of a spell. A sorcerer may only have one Rat Familiar at any one time, it is an henchman and it counts normally toward the maximum number of models permitted to the warband. If the sorcerer dies, his Rat Familiar turns back to Giant Rat form.

If the wielder is simultaneously charged by two or more opponents they will still only receive a total of +1A. If the wielder is using two whips at the same time then they get +1A for the additional hand weapon, but only the first whip gets the whipcrack +1A.

Wardogs count towards the maximum number of warriors allowed in your warband.
